resources.string: 1.woman must have all the emergency numbers with them and WhatsApp also if possible so that they can immediately tell to their family members and polices.
2.Hold your bag as tightly as you can when you are taking public transport. You can use it to hit your predator.
3.When you are walking on a road,keep your mobile phone handy but android using it.Being on the phone makes you less alert.
4.When you are travelling in an auto alone,make sure you share the auto number with someone in your family even if its during the day.
5.Similarly,if you have booked a cab, always share your coordinates with someone.
6.When in office,avoid going to isolated areas with no CCTV cameras.
7,If you feel someone is stalking you,try to find a crowded place and call someone for help.
8.Escape and run is also a good way to reduce some risks of women whennever they become in problem.They should never go with any unknown person alone at some unknown places.
9.They should be careful while communicating with someone on internet in the cyberspace.
10.Women should be very conscious while driving the car and going to any trip.They must lock all the doors of car while travelling with own or private car.
